scenario_text.value:
(Kunemon seems like he’s doing his best to
look around. There’s just one problem...)

Waaah! I thought I told you to keep away from
me!

(He’s staying so close to Ryo that he might
as well just be searching the same spots.)

(Kunemon’s trying to help, but he’s sticking
so close to Ryo it’s not doing much.)
